channel.title: Yellow flashing arrow [PI]
channel.description:
Its not real tutorial but i saw that a lot of people are searching how to add that yellow flashing arrow... So here it is! [size=12pt]Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, NpcId, X, Y, H, Walking, HP, maxHit, attack, defence, agressive (true or false?), headIcon (true or false?));[/size]
It will perfectly work if u want to make guy at quest who spawns a boss with yellow arrow flashing on his head. When you will log out spawned NPC will disappear.
[size=14pt][b]But i need help with it too! How to make that if i ect.: want to talk with guy and then arrow and guy disappear? [/b][/size] Don't flame. Thanks!

item.title: Yellow flashing arrow [PI]
item.dc:creator: @viliusxxx viliusxxx
item.description:
@viliusxxx wrote:

Could anyone just show what I need to do? :palm:

Read full topic

item.title: Yellow flashing arrow [PI]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

You must first add the packet and then find the NPC’s index. You must assign the arrow to go the entity’s index.

Read full topic

item.title: Yellow flashing arrow [PI]
item.dc:creator: @viliusxxx viliusxxx
item.description:
@viliusxxx wrote:

Its not real tutorial but i saw that a lot of people are searching how to add that yellow flashing arrow…
So here it is!
[size=12pt]Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, NpcId, X, Y, H, Walking, HP, maxHit, attack, defence, agressive (true or false?), headIcon (true or false?));[/size]

It will perfectly work if u want to make guy at quest who spawns a boss with yellow arrow flashing on his head.
When you will log out spawned NPC will disappear.

[size=14pt]But i need help with it too! How to make that if i ect.: want to talk with guy and then arrow and guy disappear? [/size]
Don’t flame. Thanks!

Read full topic
